items.name: Wooden Pickaxe
items.description: A basic pickaxe made from wood and sticks. Can mine stone and coal ore.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 wood planks and 2 sticks

items.name: Stone Pickaxe
items.description: A pickaxe made from cobblestone. More durable than wood and can mine iron ore.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 cobblestone and 2 sticks

items.name: Iron Pickaxe
items.description: A reliable pickaxe made from iron. Required to mine diamonds and other valuable ores.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 iron ingots and 2 sticks

items.name: Diamond Pickaxe
items.description: A durable pickaxe that can mine all blocks efficiently. Required to mine obsidian and ancient debris.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 diamonds and 2 sticks

items.name: Golden Pickaxe
items.description: A fast but fragile pickaxe made from gold. Mines quickly but has very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 gold ingots and 2 sticks

items.name: Netherite Pickaxe
items.description: The ultimate pickaxe with high durability and mining speed. Fire resistant and cannot be destroyed by lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond pickaxe using a netherite ingot

items.name: Wooden Axe
items.description: A basic axe for chopping wood faster than by hand. Can also be used as a weapon.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 wood planks and 2 sticks

items.name: Stone Axe
items.description: An axe made from cobblestone. More efficient than wood for chopping.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 cobblestone and 2 sticks

items.name: Iron Axe
items.description: A reliable iron axe for efficient wood gathering. Also deals good damage in combat.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 iron ingots and 2 sticks

items.name: Diamond Axe
items.description: A highly efficient diamond axe for fast wood gathering. Excellent as a weapon.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 diamonds and 2 sticks

items.name: Wooden Sword
items.description: A basic sword made from wood and sticks. Deals minimal damage but better than bare hands.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 wood planks and 1 stick

items.name: Stone Sword
items.description: A sword made from cobblestone. Better damage than wood but slower than iron.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 cobblestone and 1 stick

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A reliable iron sword with good damage and durability. Standard weapon for most combat situations.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 iron ingots and 1 stick

items.name: Diamond Sword
items.description: A powerful diamond sword with high damage output. Excellent for PvP and tough mobs.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 diamonds and 1 stick

items.name: Golden Sword
items.description: A fast but weak golden sword. Has high enchantability but very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 gold ingots and 1 stick

items.name: Netherite Sword
items.description: The ultimate sword with highest damage and knockback. Fire resistant and cannot burn in lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond sword using a netherite ingot

items.name: Bow
items.description: A ranged weapon that fires arrows. Requires arrows in inventory to use.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 sticks and 3 strings

items.name: Crossbow
items.description: A powerful ranged weapon that takes longer to load but deals more damage than a bow.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 sticks, 2 strings, 1 iron ingot, and 1 tripwire hook

items.name: Arrow
items.description: Ammunition for bows and crossbows. Can be tipped with potions for special effects.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 flint, 1 stick, and 1 feather
Dropped by skeletons when killed

items.name: Trident
items.description: A rare thrown weapon that can be used in melee or ranged combat. Can be enchanted with loyalty and channeling.

howToObtain.description: Rare drop from drowned mobs

items.name: Leather Helmet
items.description: Basic head protection made from leather. Provides minimal armor points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 leather

items.name: Leather Chestplate
items.description: Basic torso protection made from leather. Provides moderate armor points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 leather

items.name: Leather Leggings
items.description: Basic leg protection made from leather. Provides moderate armor points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 leather

items.name: Leather Boots
items.description: Basic foot protection made from leather. Provides minimal armor points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 leather

items.name: Chainmail Helmet
items.description: Chainmail head protection. Better than leather but cannot be crafted normally.

howToObtain.description: Traded from armorer villagers
Rare drop from zombie, skeleton, and husk mobs

items.name: Chainmail Chestplate
items.description: Chainmail torso protection. Better than leather but cannot be crafted normally.

howToObtain.description: Traded from armorer villagers
Rare drop from zombie, skeleton, and husk mobs

items.name: Chainmail Leggings
items.description: Chainmail leg protection. Better than leather but cannot be crafted normally.

howToObtain.description: Traded from armorer villagers
Rare drop from zombie, skeleton, and husk mobs

items.name: Chainmail Boots
items.description: Chainmail foot protection. Better than leather but cannot be crafted normally.

howToObtain.description: Traded from armorer villagers
Rare drop from zombie, skeleton, and husk mobs

items.name: Iron Helmet
items.description: Reliable iron head protection. Standard armor for most gameplay.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 iron ingots

items.name: Iron Chestplate
items.description: Reliable iron torso protection. Provides good defense for most situations.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 iron ingots

items.name: Iron Leggings
items.description: Reliable iron leg protection. Standard armor for most gameplay.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 iron ingots

items.name: Iron Boots
items.description: Reliable iron foot protection. Standard armor for most gameplay.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 iron ingots

items.name: Diamond Helmet
items.description: High-quality diamond head protection. Excellent defense with good durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 diamonds

items.name: Diamond Chestplate
items.description: High-quality diamond torso protection. Provides maximum defense for the torso.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 diamonds

items.name: Diamond Leggings
items.description: High-quality diamond leg protection. Excellent defense with good durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 diamonds

items.name: Diamond Boots
items.description: High-quality diamond foot protection. Excellent defense with good durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 diamonds

items.name: Golden Helmet
items.description: Golden head protection. High enchantability but very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 gold ingots

items.name: Golden Chestplate
items.description: Golden torso protection. High enchantability but very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 gold ingots

items.name: Golden Leggings
items.description: Golden leg protection. High enchantability but very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 gold ingots

items.name: Golden Boots
items.description: Golden foot protection. High enchantability but very low durability.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 gold ingots

items.name: Netherite Helmet
items.description: Ultimate head protection with knockback resistance. Fire resistant and cannot burn in lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond helmet using a netherite ingot

items.name: Netherite Chestplate
items.description: Ultimate torso protection with knockback resistance. Fire resistant and cannot burn in lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond chestplate using a netherite ingot

items.name: Netherite Leggings
items.description: Ultimate leg protection with knockback resistance. Fire resistant and cannot burn in lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond leggings using a netherite ingot

items.name: Netherite Boots
items.description: Ultimate foot protection with knockback resistance. Fire resistant and cannot burn in lava.

howToObtain.description: Upgrade a diamond boots using a netherite ingot

items.name: Shield
items.description: A defensive item that can block attacks and projectiles. Can be decorated with banners.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 wood planks and 1 iron ingot

items.name: Totem of Undying
items.description: A rare artifact that saves the holder from death when held in the off-hand. Dropped by evokers.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by evokers in woodland mansions and raids

items.name: Bread
items.description: A basic food item made from wheat. Restores 5 hunger points when eaten.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 wheat
Grown from wheat seeds

items.name: Cooked Beef
items.description: Cooked beef steak obtained by smelting raw beef. Restores 8 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw beef in a furnace
Dropped by cows when killed with fire

items.name: Cooked Porkchop
items.description: Cooked pork obtained by smelting raw porkchop. Restores 8 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw porkchop in a furnace
Dropped by pigs when killed with fire

items.name: Cooked Chicken
items.description: Cooked chicken obtained by smelting raw chicken. Restores 6 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw chicken in a furnace
Dropped by chickens when killed with fire

items.name: Apple
items.description: A common fruit found by breaking oak leaves. Restores 4 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Dropped when breaking oak leaves
Found in village and dungeon chests

items.name: Golden Apple
items.description: A rare food item that provides powerful regeneration and absorption effects when consumed.

howToObtain.description: Surround an apple with 8 gold ingots
Found in dungeon, mineshaft, and stronghold chests

items.name: Carrot
items.description: A vegetable that can be eaten or planted. Restores 3 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Grown from carrot crops
Rare drop from zombies

items.name: Potato
items.description: A vegetable that can be eaten raw, cooked, or planted. Restores 1 hunger point raw.

howToObtain.description: Grown from potato crops
Rare drop from zombies

items.name: Baked Potato
items.description: Cooked potato obtained by smelting raw potato. Restores 5 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Smelt potato in a furnace

items.name: Cake
items.description: A decorative food item that can be placed and eaten in slices. Each slice restores 2 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 milk buckets, 2 sugar, 1 egg, and 3 wheat

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: A food item made from pumpkin, sugar, and egg. Restores 8 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 pumpkin, 1 sugar, and 1 egg

items.name: Cookie
items.description: A small food item made from wheat and cocoa beans. Restores 2 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 wheat and 1 cocoa bean

items.name: Melon Slice
items.description: A fruit slice obtained from melon blocks. Restores 2 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from grown melon blocks

items.name: Sweet Berries
items.description: Berries grown from sweet berry bushes. Restore 2 hunger points but can damage when moving through bushes.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from sweet berry bushes

items.name: Glow Berries
items.description: Luminous berries that grow on cave vines. Restore 2 hunger points and provide light when placed.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from cave vines in lush caves

items.name: Beetroot Soup
items.description: A food item made from beetroots and a bowl. Restores 6 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 beetroots and 1 bowl

items.name: Mushroom Stew
items.description: A food item made from red and brown mushrooms with a bowl. Restores 6 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 red mushroom, 1 brown mushroom, and 1 bowl

items.name: Rabbit Stew
items.description: A nutritious stew made from rabbit, vegetables, and a bowl. Restores 10 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 cooked rabbit, 1 carrot, 1 baked potato, 1 mushroom, and 1 bowl

items.name: Suspicious Stew
items.description: A stew that provides status effects when consumed. Effects depend on the flowers used.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 red mushroom, 1 brown mushroom, 1 bowl, and any flower

items.name: Milk Bucket
items.description: A bucket filled with milk. Can be consumed to clear all status effects.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a cow, mooshroom, or goat

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: A refined metal ingot obtained by smelting iron ore. Used in many tools, weapons, and armor.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw iron in a furnace
Smelt iron ore in a furnace

items.name: Gold Ingot
items.description: A refined metal ingot obtained by smelting gold ore. Used in tools, armor, and powered rails.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw gold in a furnace
Smelt gold ore in a furnace

items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description: A refined metal ingot obtained by smelting copper ore. Used in lightning rods, spyglasses, and building.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw copper in a furnace
Smelt copper ore in a furnace

items.name: Diamond
items.description: A rare gem found deep underground. Used to craft high-tier tools, weapons, and armor.

howToObtain.description: Mine diamond ore with an iron or better pickaxe
Found in treasure chests in villages, temples, and mineshafts

items.name: Emerald
items.description: A rare gem used as currency with villagers. Found in mountain biomes and through trading.

howToObtain.description: Mine emerald ore with an iron or better pickaxe
Obtained by trading with villagers

items.name: Netherite Ingot
items.description: A rare and powerful material made from netherite scrap and gold. Used to upgrade diamond gear.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 netherite scrap and 4 gold ingots

items.name: Coal
items.description: A common fuel source obtained from coal ore. Used for smelting and crafting torches.

howToObtain.description: Mine coal ore with any pickaxe
Dropped by wither skeletons

items.name: Charcoal
items.description: An alternative to coal made by smelting wood. Functions identically to coal for fuel and torches.

howToObtain.description: Smelt any wood log in a furnace

items.name: Redstone
items.description: A mineral dust used for creating complex mechanisms and circuits. Mined from redstone ore.

howToObtain.description: Mine redstone ore with an iron or better pickaxe

items.name: Lapis Lazuli
items.description: A blue mineral used for dyeing and enchanting. Mined from lapis lazuli ore.

howToObtain.description: Mine lapis lazuli ore with a stone or better pickaxe

items.name: Nether Quartz
items.description: A white mineral found in the Nether. Used for redstone components and decorative blocks.

howToObtain.description: Mine nether quartz ore with any pickaxe

items.name: Amethyst Shard
items.description: A purple crystal shard from amethyst clusters. Used for spyglasses and tinted glass.

howToObtain.description: Break fully grown amethyst clusters

items.name: Raw Iron
items.description: Unrefined iron obtained from iron ore. Can be smelted into iron ingots.

howToObtain.description: Mine iron ore with a stone or better pickaxe

items.name: Raw Copper
items.description: Unrefined copper obtained from copper ore. Can be smelted into copper ingots.

howToObtain.description: Mine copper ore with a stone or better pickaxe

items.name: Raw Gold
items.description: Unrefined gold obtained from gold ore. Can be smelted into gold ingots.

howToObtain.description: Mine gold ore with an iron or better pickaxe

items.name: Netherite Scrap
items.description: A rare material obtained by smelting ancient debris. Used to create netherite ingots.

howToObtain.description: Smelt ancient debris in a furnace

items.name: Stick
items.description: A basic crafting material made from wood planks. Used in many tool and weapon recipes.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 wood planks

items.name: String
items.description: A thin fiber obtained from spiders and cobwebs. Used for bows, fishing rods, and wool.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by spiders and cave spiders
Break cobwebs with shears

items.name: Feather
items.description: A light item obtained from chickens. Used for arrows and book and quill.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by chickens

items.name: Flint
items.description: A hard mineral obtained by breaking gravel. Used for flint and steel and arrows.

howToObtain.description: Break gravel blocks (10% chance)

items.name: Leather
items.description: Animal hide obtained from cows, horses, and similar mobs. Used for leather armor and book binding.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by cows, horses, donkeys, and similar mobs

items.name: Rabbit Hide
items.description: Hide obtained from rabbits. Used to craft leather and bundles.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by rabbits

items.name: Phantom Membrane
items.description: A membrane obtained from phantoms. Used to repair elytra and brew slow falling potions.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by phantoms

items.name: Blaze Rod
items.description: A rod obtained from blazes in Nether fortresses. Used for brewing stands and ender eyes.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by blazes in Nether fortresses

items.name: Blaze Powder
items.description: Powder made from blaze rods. Used as brewing fuel and for ender eyes.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 blaze rod

items.name: Ender Pearl
items.description: A pearl obtained from endermen. Used for teleportation and crafting ender eyes.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by endermen

items.name: Eye of Ender
items.description: An eye made from ender pearls and blaze powder. Used to locate and activate end portals.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 ender pearl and 1 blaze powder

items.name: Ghast Tear
items.description: A tear obtained from ghasts. Used to brew regeneration potions.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by ghasts

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: An explosive powder obtained from creepers and ghasts. Used for TNT, fireworks, and splash potions.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by creepers
Dropped by ghasts

items.name: Magma Cream
items.description: A slimy cream obtained from magma cubes or crafting. Used for fire resistance potions.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by magma cubes
Craft using 1 slime ball and 1 blaze powder

items.name: Slime Ball
items.description: A bouncy ball obtained from slimes. Used for sticky pistons, leads, and magma cream.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by slimes

items.name: Spider Eye
items.description: An eye obtained from spiders. Used for poisonous potions and fermented spider eye.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by spiders and cave spiders

items.name: Fermented Spider Eye
items.description: A fermented spider eye used to corrupt potion effects. Creates harmful or inverted potions.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 spider eye, 1 sugar, and 1 brown mushroom

items.name: Glowstone Dust
items.description: Luminous dust obtained from glowstone blocks. Used to enhance potion potency and create light sources.

howToObtain.description: Break glowstone blocks in the Nether

items.name: Sugar
items.description: Sweet crystals obtained from sugar cane. Used for cake, potions, and fermented spider eye.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 sugar cane

items.name: Glistering Melon Slice
items.description: A golden melon slice used to brew healing potions. Crafted from melon slice and gold nuggets.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 melon slice and 8 gold nuggets

items.name: Nether Star
items.description: A rare star obtained from the wither. Used to craft beacons for powerful area effects.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by the wither boss

items.name: Heart of the Sea
items.description: A rare item found in buried treasure chests. Used to craft conduits for underwater breathing.

howToObtain.description: Found in buried treasure chests

items.name: Nautilus Shell
items.description: A shell obtained from drowned mobs or fishing. Used to craft conduits.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by drowned mobs
Obtained by fishing

items.name: Prismarine Shard
items.description: A shard obtained from guardians and elder guardians. Used for prismarine blocks.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by guardians and elder guardians

items.name: Prismarine Crystals
items.description: Crystals obtained from guardians. Used for sea lanterns.

howToObtain.description: Dropped by guardians and elder guardians

items.name: Echo Shard
items.description: A mysterious shard found in ancient cities. Used to craft recovery compasses.

howToObtain.description: Found in chests in ancient cities

items.name: Sculk Catalyst
items.description: A block that spreads sculk when mobs die near it. Found in ancient cities.

howToObtain.description: Found in ancient cities

items.name: Oak Planks
items.description: Wooden planks made from oak logs. A basic building material used in many recipes.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 oak log (makes 4 planks)

items.name: Oak Door
items.description: A wooden door that can be opened and closed. Provides security and privacy.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 oak planks

items.name: Oak Sign
items.description: A wooden sign that can display text. Useful for labeling and directions.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 oak planks and 1 stick

items.name: Oak Hanging Sign
items.description: A decorative sign that hangs from chains. Can display text like regular signs.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 stripped oak logs and 2 chains

items.name: Oak Boat
items.description: A boat made from oak planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 oak planks

items.name: Oak Boat with Chest
items.description: A boat with storage chest for transporting items across water.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 oak boat and 1 chest

items.name: Spruce Boat
items.description: A boat made from spruce planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 spruce planks

items.name: Birch Boat
items.description: A boat made from birch planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 birch planks

items.name: Jungle Boat
items.description: A boat made from jungle planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 jungle planks

items.name: Acacia Boat
items.description: A boat made from acacia planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 acacia planks

items.name: Dark Oak Boat
items.description: A boat made from dark oak planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 dark oak planks

items.name: Mangrove Boat
items.description: A boat made from mangrove planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 mangrove planks

items.name: Cherry Boat
items.description: A boat made from cherry planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 cherry planks

items.name: Pale Oak Boat
items.description: A boat made from pale oak planks. Used for traveling across water quickly.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 pale oak planks

items.name: Bamboo Raft
items.description: A raft made from bamboo. Functions like a boat but with different appearance.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 bamboo planks

items.name: Bamboo Raft with Chest
items.description: A bamboo raft with storage chest for transporting items across water.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 bamboo raft and 1 chest

items.name: Minecart
items.description: A cart that runs on rails. Used for transportation in mines and automated systems.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 iron ingots

items.name: Minecart with Chest
items.description: A minecart with storage chest for transporting items on rails.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 minecart and 1 chest

items.name: Minecart with Furnace
items.description: A minecart with furnace that can be powered by fuel to move on rails.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 minecart and 1 furnace

items.name: Minecart with Hopper
items.description: A minecart with hopper that can collect and transfer items on rails.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 minecart and 1 hopper

items.name: Saddle
items.description: Equipment for riding horses, striders, and pigs. Cannot be crafted, only found in loot.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon, temple, and fortress chests
Rare treasure from fishing

items.name: Carrot on a Stick
items.description: A tool used to control and speed up ridden pigs. Requires a saddle on the pig.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 fishing rod and 1 carrot

items.name: Warped Fungus on a Stick
items.description: A tool used to control and speed up ridden striders in the Nether.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 fishing rod and 1 warped fungus

items.name: Elytra
items.description: Wings that allow gliding through the air. Found in end cities on item frames.

howToObtain.description: Found in end city ships on item frames

items.name: Red Dye
items.description: A primary dye color obtained from poppies, red tulips, or beetroots.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 poppy, red tulip, or beetroot

items.description: A dye color obtained by smelting cactus.

items.description: A dye color obtained from lapis lazuli or cornflowers.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 lapis lazuli or cornflower

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 bone meal or lily of the valley

items.name: Black Dye
items.description: A dye color obtained from ink sacs or wither roses.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 ink sac or wither rose

items.description: A dye color obtained from cocoa beans.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 cocoa bean

items.description: A dye color obtained from dandelions or sunflowers.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 dandelion or sunflower

items.description: A dye color obtained from blue orchids or by combining blue and white dye.

items.description: A dye color obtained by combining green and white dye.

items.description: A dye color obtained from pink tulips, peonies, or by combining red and white dye.

items.description: A dye color obtained by combining black and white dye.

items.description: A dye color obtained from azure bluet, white tulip, oxeye daisy, or by combining gray and white dye.

items.name: Red Candle
items.description: A decorative light source that can be colored and lit. Provides ambient lighting.

items.description: A music disc that plays '13' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.description: A music disc that plays 'Chirp' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.description: A music disc that plays 'Far' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Mall
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Mall' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Mellohi
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Mellohi' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Stal
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Stal' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Strad
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Strad' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Ward
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Ward' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc 11
items.description: A rare music disc that plays '11' by C418. Has a creepy, glitchy sound.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests (very rare)
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Wait
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Wait' by C418. Found in dungeon chests or created by creepers.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon chests
Dropped when a creeper is killed by a skeleton

items.name: Music Disc Pigstep
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Pigstep' by Lena Raine. Found in bastion remnant chests.

howToObtain.description: Found in bastion remnant chests

items.name: Music Disc Otherside
items.description: A music disc that plays 'Otherside' by Lena Raine. Found in stronghold and ancient city chests.

howToObtain.description: Found in stronghold and ancient city chests

items.name: Music Disc Relic
items.description: A rare music disc with ancient sounds. Found in trail ruins chests.

howToObtain.description: Found in trail ruins chests

items.name: Disc Fragment 5
items.description: A fragment of an ancient music disc. Combine 9 fragments to create Music Disc 5.

howToObtain.description: Found in ancient city chests

items.name: Bucket
items.description: An empty container used to carry liquids like water, lava, and milk.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 iron ingots

items.name: Water Bucket
items.description: A bucket filled with water. Can be used to create infinite water sources or extinguish fires.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a water source block

items.name: Lava Bucket
items.description: A bucket filled with lava. Can be used as a long-lasting fuel source or for security.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a lava source block

items.name: Milk Bucket
items.description: A bucket filled with milk. Can be consumed to clear all status effects.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a cow, mooshroom, or goat

items.name: Powder Snow Bucket
items.description: A bucket filled with powder snow. Can trap mobs and entities when placed.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a powder snow block

items.name: Bucket of Axolotl
items.description: A bucket containing an axolotl. Can transport axolotls safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on an axolotl

items.name: Bucket of Tropical Fish
items.description: A bucket containing a tropical fish. Can transport tropical fish safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a tropical fish

items.name: Bucket of Cod
items.description: A bucket containing a cod. Can transport cod safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a cod

items.name: Bucket of Salmon
items.description: A bucket containing a salmon. Can transport salmon safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a salmon

items.name: Bucket of Pufferfish
items.description: A bucket containing a pufferfish. Can transport pufferfish safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a pufferfish

items.name: Bucket of Tadpole
items.description: A bucket containing a tadpole. Can transport tadpoles safely.

howToObtain.description: Use an empty bucket on a tadpole

items.name: Lead
items.description: A rope used to leash and tie up mobs. Can be attached to fences.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 strings and 1 slime ball

items.name: Name Tag
items.description: An item used to name mobs. Named mobs won't despawn and can be customized.

howToObtain.description: Found in dungeon, mineshaft, and woodland mansion chests
Treasure catch from fishing

items.name: Compass
items.description: A navigation tool that points toward the world spawn point.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 iron ingots and 1 redstone

items.name: Recovery Compass
items.description: A special compass that points to the location of your last death.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 echo shard and 1 compass

items.name: Clock
items.description: A timekeeping device that shows the current in-game time of day.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 gold ingots and 1 redstone

items.name: Spyglass
items.description: An optical device that provides zoomed-in view when looking through it.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 copper ingots and 1 amethyst shard

items.name: Fishing Rod
items.description: A tool used for fishing in water. Can also pull entities and items.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 sticks and 2 strings

items.name: Shears
items.description: A tool used for shearing sheep, collecting leaves, and breaking cobwebs.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 iron ingots

items.name: Flint and Steel
items.description: A tool used to create fire or ignite TNT and nether portals.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 iron ingot and 1 flint

items.name: Fire Charge
items.description: A fire-starting projectile that can be launched from dispensers.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 blaze powder, 1 coal/charcoal, and 1 gunpowder

items.name: Brush
items.description: A tool used for brushing suspicious blocks to reveal hidden items.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 feather, 1 copper ingot, and 1 stick

items.name: Bundle
items.description: A storage item that can hold multiple stacks of different items in one inventory slot.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 rabbit hide and 2 strings

items.name: Armor Stand
items.description: A decorative entity that can display armor, weapons, and other items.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 sticks and 1 smooth stone slab

items.name: Item Frame
items.description: A decorative frame that can display items and blocks on walls.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 sticks and 1 leather

items.name: Glow Item Frame
items.description: A glowing version of the item frame that illuminates displayed items.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 item frame and 1 glow ink sac

items.name: Wheat Seeds
items.description: Seeds obtained from breaking grass. Can be planted to grow wheat.

howToObtain.description: Dropped when breaking tall grass

items.name: Beetroot Seeds
items.description: Seeds obtained from beetroots. Can be planted to grow beetroots.

howToObtain.description: Obtained from beetroot crops

items.name: Melon Seeds
items.description: Seeds obtained from melon slices. Can be planted to grow melon stems.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 melon slice

items.name: Pumpkin Seeds
items.description: Seeds obtained from pumpkins. Can be planted to grow pumpkin stems.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 pumpkin

items.name: Wheat
items.description: A crop obtained from fully grown wheat plants. Used for bread and animal breeding.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from fully grown wheat crops

items.name: Beetroot
items.description: A vegetable obtained from beetroot crops. Can be eaten or used for soup.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from fully grown beetroot crops

items.name: Carrot
items.description: A vegetable that can be eaten or planted. Restores 3 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from fully grown carrot crops

items.name: Potato
items.description: A vegetable that can be eaten raw, cooked, or planted. Restores 1 hunger point raw.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from fully grown potato crops

items.name: Poisonous Potato
items.description: A rare poisonous variant of potato. Eating it may cause poison effect.

howToObtain.description: Rare drop from potato crops (2% chance)

items.name: Sugar Cane
items.description: A plant that grows near water. Used to make sugar and paper.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from sugar cane plants

items.name: Bamboo
items.description: A fast-growing plant found in jungle biomes. Used for scaffolding and fuel.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from bamboo plants

items.name: Cocoa Beans
items.description: Beans obtained from cocoa pods on jungle trees. Used for brown dye and cookies.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from cocoa pods on jungle trees

items.name: Kelp
items.description: An underwater plant that grows in oceans. Can be dried for food and fuel.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from kelp plants in ocean biomes

items.name: Dried Kelp
items.description: Dried kelp obtained by smelting kelp. Can be eaten or crafted into blocks.

howToObtain.description: Smelt kelp in a furnace

items.name: Nether Wart
items.description: A fungus found in Nether fortresses. Essential for brewing potions.

howToObtain.description: Found growing in Nether fortress soul sand gardens

items.name: Chorus Fruit
items.description: A fruit from chorus plants in the End. Eating it teleports the player randomly.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from chorus plants in the End

items.name: Popped Chorus Fruit
items.description: Chorus fruit popped by smelting. Used to craft purpur blocks.

howToObtain.description: Smelt chorus fruit in a furnace

items.name: Sweet Berries
items.description: Berries grown from sweet berry bushes. Restore 2 hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from sweet berry bushes in taiga biomes

items.name: Glow Berries
items.description: Luminous berries that grow on cave vines. Restore 2 hunger points and provide light.

howToObtain.description: Harvested from cave vines in lush caves

items.name: Pitcher Pod
items.description: A seed obtained from sniffer dinosaurs. Grows into pitcher plants.

howToObtain.description: Dug up by sniffer mobs from suspicious sand

items.name: Torch
items.description: A basic light source that prevents mob spawning and melts snow.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 stick and 1 coal/charcoal

items.name: Soul Torch
items.description: A blue torch made from soul soil/sand. Provides dimmer light than regular torches.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 stick, 1 coal/charcoal, and 1 soul soil/sand

items.name: Lantern
items.description: A decorative light source that can be hung from blocks or placed on surfaces.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 iron nuggets and 1 torch

items.name: Soul Lantern
items.description: A blue lantern that provides dimmer light than regular lanterns.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 iron nuggets and 1 soul torch

items.name: Campfire
items.description: A light source that cooks food and provides signal smoke. Can be used for cooking without fuel.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 sticks, 3 logs, and 1 coal/charcoal

items.name: Soul Campfire
items.description: A blue campfire that provides dimmer light and repels piglins.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 sticks, 3 logs, and 1 soul soil/sand

items.name: Redstone
items.description: A mineral dust used for creating complex mechanisms and circuits. Mined from redstone ore.

howToObtain.description: Mine redstone ore with an iron or better pickaxe

items.name: Redstone Repeater
items.description: A redstone component that repeats and delays signals. Essential for complex circuits.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 redstone torches, 1 redstone, and 3 stone

items.name: Redstone Comparator
items.description: A redstone component that compares signal strengths or measures container fullness.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 redstone torches, 3 stone, and 1 nether quartz

items.name: Observer
items.description: A block that detects block updates and emits redstone signals.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 cobblestone, 2 redstone, and 1 nether quartz

items.name: Piston
items.description: A block that pushes other blocks when powered by redstone.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 wood planks, 4 cobblestone, 1 iron ingot, and 1 redstone

items.name: Sticky Piston
items.description: A piston that can pull blocks back when retracted.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 piston and 1 slime ball

items.name: Hopper
items.description: A block that collects and transfers items between containers.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 iron ingots and 1 chest

items.name: Dropper
items.description: A block that drops items when powered by redstone.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 cobblestone and 1 redstone

items.name: Dispenser
items.description: A block that shoots items or places blocks when powered by redstone.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 7 cobblestone, 1 bow, and 1 redstone

items.name: Note Block
items.description: A block that plays musical notes when powered by redstone.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 8 wood planks and 1 redstone

items.name: Redstone Lamp
items.description: A light source that turns on when powered by redstone.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 redstone and 1 glowstone

items.name: TNT
items.description: An explosive block that can be activated by redstone or fire.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 5 gunpowder and 4 sand

items.name: Daylight Detector
items.description: A block that emits redstone signal based on daylight level.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 glass, 3 nether quartz, and 3 wood slabs

items.name: Tripwire Hook
items.description: A component used with string to create tripwire traps.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 iron ingot, 1 stick, and 1 wood plank

items.name: Trapped Chest
items.description: A chest that emits redstone signal when opened.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 chest and 1 tripwire hook

items.name: Lever
items.description: A simple switch that can be toggled on and off to control redstone circuits.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 stick and 1 cobblestone

items.name: Stone Button
items.description: A button that provides temporary redstone signal when pressed.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 stone

items.name: Wooden Button
items.description: A wooden button that provides temporary redstone signal when pressed.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 wood plank

items.name: Stone Pressure Plate
items.description: A pressure plate that emits redstone signal when entities step on it.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 stone

items.name: Wooden Pressure Plate
items.description: A wooden pressure plate that emits redstone signal when entities step on it.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 wood planks

items.name: Light Weighted Pressure Plate
items.description: A pressure plate that emits signal strength based on number of entities on it.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 gold ingots

items.name: Heavy Weighted Pressure Plate
items.description: A pressure plate that emits signal strength based on number of entities on it.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 2 iron ingots

items.name: Target Block
items.description: A block that emits redstone signal when hit by projectiles.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 4 redstone and 1 hay bale

items.name: Bee Nest
items.description: A natural block that houses bees and emits redstone signal when bees leave/enter.

howToObtain.description: Naturally generated on trees in flower forests and plains

items.name: Beehive
items.description: A crafted version of bee nest that can be moved and emits redstone signal.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 6 wood planks and 3 honeycombs

items.name: Sculk Sensor
items.description: A block that detects vibrations and emits redstone signal.

howToObtain.description: Found in ancient cities in the Deep Dark

items.name: Calibrated Sculk Sensor
items.description: An advanced sculk sensor that can filter specific vibrations.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 1 sculk sensor and 3 amethyst shards

items.name: Lightning Rod
items.description: A block that attracts lightning strikes and emits redstone signal when struck.

howToObtain.description: Craft using 3 copper ingots
